thread.title: Antonio Conte won't tone down the celebrations if Chelsea beat Manchester United despite Jose Mourinho's protests
thread.title_full: Antonio Conte won't tone down the celebrations if Chelsea beat Manchester United despite Jose Mourinho's protests

author: Neil McLeman
title: Antonio Conte won't tone down the celebrations if Chelsea beat Manchester United despite Jose Mourinho's protests
text:
Sport Antonio Conte won't tone down the celebrations if Chelsea beat Manchester United despite Jose Mourinho's protests The Red Devils boss accused the Italian of trying to humiliate him when the Blues netted a fourth against them in October Share The pair clashed in October when their teams met in the Premier League (Photo: Man Utd via Getty) Share   
Antonio Conte will not tone down his celebrations if Chelsea beat Manchester United at Stamford Bridge again on Monday. 
Jose Mourinho accused the current Blues boss of trying to humiliate him with his actions after N'Golo Kante's fourth goal in the crushing Premier League defeat in October. 
The bad feeling spread to the tunnel with United coaching staff snubbing the Italian's handshake in the tunnel. 
Conte said he had not since cleared the air with the Portuguese coach. “But it's not important,” he said. “Nothing we have to clarify with him.” Conte has played down the incident (Photo: Reuters) 
But asked if he will change his touchline behaviour for the FA Cup re-match, Conte said: “I think I've shown in my period at Chelsea, but not only here – always, in every team I've managed – that I live the game with great passion. Sometimes I want to share my enthusiasm with my players, my staff and also the fans. It's normal. We are not in the same way. But for me the most important thing is to try and win, and then think about another celebration.” 
Mourinho has since accused his former club of playing boring, defensive football as they opened up a 10-point lead at the top of the table. 
The Italian insisted he will not indulge in pre-match mind games – but then insisted Manchester United have a better squad than Chelsea. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
